basics.name: stevending1st
basics.label: Full stack programmer
basics.summary: As a front-end engineer, I focus on enhancing web interactivity with technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript. Familiar with frameworks like React and Vue.js, I have contributed to multiple projects aimed at refining user experiences. I have also dabbled in back-end development with Node.js to gain a comprehensive understanding of full-stack development. In team settings, I actively learn and contribute to the open-source community, continuously improving my technical skills.

work.name: idea2app
highlights: Responsible for the design and development of front-end applications, and the implementation of some pure back-end services.
Collaborated with the back-end team to build and maintain API services, develop SDKs, and discuss microservices and their authentication schemes.
Served as Project Owner (PO), coordinating with upstream and downstream partners, and supervising project progress.
Engaged in team management and product design, providing necessary technical support and solutions.
Authored and recorded online courses to share professional knowledge and skills with industry insiders and the broader community.

work.name: Zhiming
work.summary: Participated in the development of financial-related systems, responsible for the implementation of functional modules and database migration tasks.
highlights: Conducted front-end testing to ensure the correctness and stability of system functions.

awards.title: OpenDigger Open Source Software Ecological data Analysis and Mining platform Challenge third prize
COSCon Star of the Seventh China Open Source Conference
